name: Marlena Graves
description: A reclusive occultist who runs a magical pawn shop in a hidden alleyway.

communication.mannerisms: Formal and deliberate, with occasional cryptic metaphors
keyPhrases: The veil between worlds is thinner than you think.
Knowledge is power, and power comes at a price.
Beware what you seek, for it may find you first.

connections: Allied with a secret cabal of mystics
Enemy of Luther Kaine, a charismatic cult leader

questUtility: Gatekeeper (controls access to rare magical materials)

uniqueFeatures: Heterochromia: one green eye, one blue eye
A large, ornate silver ring with a glowing sapphire
appearance.wardrobe: Dark robes with silver embroidery resembling constellations
appearance.bodyLanguage: Often clasps her hands together and tilts her head slightly when thinking

behaviorTriggers.reaction: Becomes hostile and refuses to assist

behaviorTriggers.trigger: Player gifts her a rare magical item
behaviorTriggers.reaction: Becomes friendly and shares a crucial secret

hintsAndClues: Subtly mentions a hidden artifact in a nearby abandoned church
Occasionally hums a tune linked to an ancient ritual

progression.evolution: If the player helps her reclaim a stolen artifact, she becomes a powerful ally with access to forbidden magic.
progression.potentialBetrayal: If the player aligns with Luther Kaine, she will turn against them.
